text: There's something missing in the music industry today... and it's music. Songs you hear don't last, it's just product fed to you by the industry.
author: Jimmy Buffett

text: I like when guests come over early and we chop veggies and talk and play music.
author: John Stamos

text: I can play punk rock, and I love playing punk rock, but I was into every other style of music before I played punk rock.
author: Travis Barker

text: Beyond a certain point, the music isn't mine anymore. It's yours.
author: Phil Collins

text: Music was always the distraction, so it was the obvious choice to pursue. My dad always said to find a job I love to do, that way it wouldn't feel like a job. So I did that.
author: Jason Mraz
